concept.title: Forced line break in table cells

conbody.p: The outputclass=force-break attribute is maintained for legacy compatibility reasons.

When outputting long strings in a constrained location (for example, a table cell) you can use this attribute to force the string to break at the table border, to avoid content overlapping the next cell.
